thread.section_title: toolani Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von toolani | toolani.com
thread.title: Michaela

author: Michaela
title: Michaela
text:
I was searching for options about how to make cheaper calls to Europe for some time now. Toolani is extremely easy to use and also unbelievably cost efficient.
I moved to England almost 12 years ago with part of my family loving in Canada and Czech Republic.
Calls costed me thousands of pounds before the era of voip calls...
Now with Toolani I spend 1.6p per minute!!
I would recommend it to everybody who is looking for reliable way how to make very cheap calls.
The quality of the call is also great, sometimes even better than mobile phones...
Many thanks!
